Reggie Tsiboe (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 7 n'ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 1964) bụ onye Ghana-English na-eme egwuregwu, onye na-agba egwu na otu n'ime ndị na-abụ abụ nke otu disco Boney M
n'etiti afọ 1982 na 1986 na mgbe e mesịrị n'etiti afọ 1989 na 1990.

N'afọ 1982, Tsiboe nọchiri anya onye na-agba egwu Bobby Farrell, mana n'afọ 1984 Farrell sonyeere otu ahụ wee bụrụ quintet. N'afọ 1986, ndị otu mbụ ahụ kewara mgbe afọ iri gara nke ọma, mana n'afọ 1989, Liz Mitchell na Reggie guzobere nsụgharị ọhụrụ nke Boney M
n'afọ 1990 wepụtara site n'enyemaka nke onye mmepụta Frank Farian otu "Stories", mana ọnwa ole na ole ka e mesịrị, ha abụọ gara ụzọ dị iche iche

Tsiboe pụtara na abọm atọ ikpeazụ nke Boney M.: Ten Thousand Lightyears (1984), Kalimba de Luna - 16 Happy Songs (1984) na Eye Dance (1985) ma dekọọkwaa egwu Krismas na otu ahụ, nke ewepụtara na mba ụwa naanị mgbe nkewa nke ìgwè ahụ na abọm ọhụrụ Boney M
Christmas, The 20 Greatest Christmas Songs n'afọ 1986

Reggie bụrụ abụ isi olu na ọtụtụ egwu Boney M., gụnyere "Kalimba de Luna", "Happy Song", "Going Back West", "My Chérie Amour", "Young, Free and Single", "Dreadlock Holiday" na "Barbarella Fortuneteller".

N'abalị 21 ọnwa Septemba afọ 2006, Tsiboe na ndị isi abụọ ọzọ na-abụ abụ nke Boney M., Liz Mitchell na Marcia Barrett, bụ ndị ọbịa pụrụ iche na London na mbido egwu Daddy Cool, nke dabeere na egwu nke otu a ma ama.
Tupu ọ banye na otu ahụ, ọ bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Ghana
Otu n'ime ihe nkiri ndị mere ka ọ bụrụ onye ama ama bụ ihe nkiri Love Brewed in an African Pot
N'ịgbaso oge Boney M ya, Tsiboe laghachiri ime ihe nkiri, O meela ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri TV ole na ole nke UK gụnyere Doctor Who
Tsiboe bi ugbu a na Marlborough, Wiltshire na England.
